exceptions.exn: The LHS of SF_rev_f2 (SF_rev (SF_seq_f2 _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

Dependent type error in rewrite of (fun _pattern_value_ : seq R => SF_make (rev _pattern_value_) (rev (SF_ly (SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n)))) (SF_rev_0 (SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n))) = SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part b a n)) Type error was: Illegal application: The term "@SF_make" of type "forall (T : Type) (lx : seq R) (ly : seq T), size lx = S (size ly) -> SF_seq" cannot be applied to the terms "Rbar" : "Set" "rev _pattern_value_" : "seq R" "rev (SF_ly (SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n)))" : "seq Rbar" "SF_rev_0 (SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n))" : "size (rev (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n)))) = S (size (rev (SF_ly (SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n)))))" The 4th term has type "size (rev (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n)))) = S (size (rev (SF_ly (SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n)))))" which should be coercible to "size (rev _pattern_value_) = S (size (rev (SF_ly (SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n)))))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: R -> R
b: R
a: R
n: nat

Goal:
SF_rev (SF_sup_seq f a b n) = SF_sup_seq f b a n

Premises:
SF_rev = fun (T : Type) (s : SF_seq) => SF_make (rev (SF_lx s)) (rev (SF_ly s)) (SF_rev_0 s) : forall T : Type, SF_seq -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
SF_sup_seq = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) => SF_seq_f2 (Sup_fct f) (unif_part a b n) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> nat -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
SF_sup_lx : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), SF_lx (SF_sup_seq f a b n) = unif_part a b n
SF_sup_ly : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), SF_ly (SF_sup_seq f a b n) = behead (pairmap (Sup_fct f) 0 (unif_part a b n))
SF_inf_lx : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), SF_lx (SF_inf_seq f a b n) = unif_part a b n
Inf_fct_bound : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Inf_fct f a b = Inf_fct f b a
Sup_fct_bound : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), Sup_fct f a b = Sup_fct f b a
SF_inf_ly : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), SF_ly (SF_inf_seq f a b n) = behead (pairmap (Inf_fct f) 0 (unif_part a b n))
Riemann_fine_unif_part : forall (f : R -> R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat), (forall a0 b0 : R, a0 <= b0 -> a0 <= f a0 b0 <= b0) -> a <= b -> seq_step (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) <= (b - a) / (INR n + 1) /\ pointed_subdiv (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) /\ SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n)) = a /\ last (SF_h (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) (SF_lx (SF_seq_f2 f (unif_part a b n))) = b
Sup_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Lub_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
Inf_fct = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => if Req_EM_T a b then Finite 0 else Glb_Rbar (fun y : R => exists x : R, y = f x /\ Rmin a b < x < Rmax a b) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rbar Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]
SF_rev_surj : forall s s0 : SF_seq, s = s0 -> SF_rev s = SF_rev s0 where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_rev_inj : forall s s0 : SF_seq, SF_rev s = SF_rev s0 -> s = s0 where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_val_seq = fun (T : Type) (f : R -> T) (a b : R) (n : nat) => SF_seq_f2 (fun x y : R => f ((x + y) / 2)) (unif_part a b n) : forall T : Type, (R -> T) -> R -> R -> nat -> SF_seq Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
is_subdivision = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l : Rlist) => {l0 : Rlist & adapted_couple f a b l l0} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _]
SF_rev_invol : forall s : SF_seq, SF_rev (SF_rev s) = s where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_inf_seq = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (n : nat) => SF_seq_f2 (Inf_fct f) (unif_part a b n) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> nat -> SF_seq Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope nat_scope]
SF_map_rev : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_rev (SF_map f0 s) = SF_map f0 (SF_rev s) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
adapted_couple = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) (l lf : Rlist) => ordered_Rlist l /\ pos_Rl l 0 = Rmin a b /\ pos_Rl l (Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l)) = Rmax a b /\ Rlength l = S (Rlength lf) /\ (forall i : nat, (i < Init.Nat.pred (Rlength l))%nat -> constant_D_eq f (open_interval (pos_Rl l i) (pos_Rl l (S i))) (pos_Rl lf i)) : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Rlist -> Rlist -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope _ _]
SF_rev_cons : forall (h : R * ?T) (s : SF_seq), SF_rev (SF_cons h s) = SF_rcons (SF_rev s) h where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_rev_rcons : forall (s : SF_seq) (t : R * ?T), SF_rev (SF_rcons s t) = SF_cons t (SF_rev s) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_rev_f2 : forall (f2 : R -> R -> ?T) (P : seq R), (forall x y : R, f2 x y = f2 y x) -> SF_rev (SF_seq_f2 f2 P) = SF_seq_f2 f2 (rev P) where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
Riemann_fine = fun a b : R => within (fun ptd : SF_seq => pointed_subdiv ptd /\ SF_h ptd = Rmin a b /\ last (SF_h ptd) (SF_lx ptd) = Rmax a b) (locally_dist (fun ptd : SF_seq => seq_step (SF_lx ptd))) : R -> R -> (SF_seq -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope function_scope]
mkStepFun : forall (a b : R) (fe : R -> R), IsStepFun fe a b -> StepFun a b
SF_map_lx : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_lx (SF_map f0 s) = SF_lx s where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_map_ly : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (s : SF_seq), SF_ly (SF_map f0 s) = [seq f0 i | i <- SF_ly s] where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]
SF_map_f1 : forall (f0 : ?T -> ?T0) (f1 : R -> ?T) (P : seq R), SF_map f0 (SF_seq_f1 f1 P) = SF_seq_f1 (fun x : R => f0 (f1 x)) P where ?T : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type] ?T0 : [f : R -> R a : R b : R n : nat |- Type]

```coq
unfold SF_rev, SF_sup_seq.
rewrite SF_rev_f2.
rewrite SF_sup_lx.
rewrite SF_sup_ly.
rewrite rev_unif_part.
rewrite behead_pairmap_rev.
rewrite pairmap_rev.
rewrite SF_inf_lx.
rewrite SF_inf_ly.
rewrite behead_pairmap_rev.
rewrite pairmap_rev.
apply SF_rev_surj.
rewrite SF_rev_f2.
rewrite SF_sup_lx.
rewrite SF_sup_ly.
rewrite rev_unif_part.
rewrite behead_pairmap_rev.
rewrite pairmap_rev.
reflexivity.
Qed.```

original: unfold SF_rev, SF_sup_seq. rewrite SF_rev_f2. rewrite SF_sup_lx. rewrite SF_sup_ly. rewrite rev_unif_part. rewrite behead_pairmap_rev. rewrite pairmap_rev. rewrite SF_inf_lx. rewrite SF_inf_ly. rewrite behead_pairmap_rev. rewrite pairmap_rev. apply SF_rev_surj. rewrite SF_rev_f2. rewrite SF_sup_lx. rewrite SF_sup_ly. rewrite rev_unif_part. rewrite behead_pairmap_rev. rewrite pairmap_rev. reflexivity.
